A visit to the Science Exhibition at Northwestern University
18  February,  2024
In joint coordination with the Best Buddies College chapter and as part of the efforts to unify the team's initiatives, Best Buddies Qatar organized a visit to the Science Exhibition held at Northwestern University. The visit program was attended by 20 female participants (from both categories) from Al Khor Secondary School for Girls
.
